item.description:
No matter where you are in the Course, just "checking it out" or well acquainted, you are welcome to join our group!

Our Sunday meetups start at 3:00 with a few minutes of socializing and end at 5:00. We sit around a large table. The first part of each meeting involves several minutes of silent meditation as we leave the busy distractions of our lives behind. This year some of us have chosen to do the 365 daily lessons of the workbook. We take the first 30 minutes to discuss any topics of interest related to the lessons for the preceding week. We spend the remainder of the group reading and discussing the text. If you are interested in checking it out, we are using the calendar posted at the Circle of Atonement website: http://www.circleofa.org/study/calendar.php?prm=12&year=2011&chm=1 We look forward to meeting you!

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: ACIM Discussion Group
